scripts.build: npm-run-all build:common build:flow build:ai build:plugins build:third_party build:dotprompt build:samples
scripts.build:common: cd common && pnpm install && pnpm build
scripts.build:flow: cd flow && pnpm install && pnpm build
scripts.build:ai: cd ai && pnpm install && pnpm build
scripts.build:dotprompt: cd dotprompt && pnpm install && pnpm build
scripts.build:plugins: for i in plugins/*/; do cd $i && pnpm install && pnpm build && cd ../..; done
scripts.build:third_party: for i in third_party/*/; do cd $i && pnpm install && pnpm build && cd ../..; done
scripts.build:samples: pwd && for i in samples/*/; do cd $i && pnpm install && pnpm build && cd ../..; done
scripts.pack:all: (mkdir ../dist || true) && npm-run-all pack:common pack:flow pack:ai pack:dotprompt pack:plugins pack:third_party
scripts.pack:plugins: for i in plugins/*/; do cd $i && pnpm pack --pack-destination ../../../dist && cd ../..; done
scripts.pack:third_party: for i in third_party/*/; do cd $i && pnpm pack --pack-destination ../../../dist && cd ../..; done
